hizbs.text: i rajyatte (makkaye) kkeant nan satyam ceytu parayunnu
niyakatte i rajyatte nivasiyan tanum
janayitavineyum, avan janippikkunnatineyum tanneyana satyam
tirccayayum manusyane nam srsticcittullat klesam sahikkenta nilayilakunnu
avane pitikutan arkkum sadhikkukaye illenn avan vicarikkunnuneta
avan parayunnu: nan melkkumel panam tulaccirikkunnu enn‌
avan vicarikkunnuneta; avane arunkantittillenn‌
avan nam rant kannukal untakki keatuttittille
oru navum rantu cuntukalum
telinnu nilkkunna rantu patakal avannu nam kattikeatukkukayum ceytirikkunnu
ennitt a malampatayil avan tallikkatannilla
a malampata entanenn ninakkariyamea
oru atimaye meacippikkuka
allenkil pattiniyulla nalil bhaksanam keatukkuka
kutumbabandhamulla anathaykk‌
allenkil katutta daridy‌ramulla sadhuvin‌
purame, visvasikkukayum, ksama keantum karunyam keantum parasparam upadesikkukayum ceytavarute kuttattil avan ayittirukayum ceyyuka
annane ceyyunnavaratre valatupaksakkar
nam'mute drstantannal nisedhiccavararea avaratre itatupaksattinre alkkar
avarute mel ataccumutiya narakagniyunt‌
suryanum atinre prabhayum tanneyana satyam
candran tanneyana satyam; at atine tutarnn varumpeal
pakaline tanneyana satyam; at atine (suryane) pratyaksappetuttumpel
ratriye tanneyana satyam; at atine mutumpeal
akasatteyum, atine sthapicca ritiyeyum tanneyana satyam
bhumiyeyum, atine vistrtamakkiya ritiyeyum tanneyana satyam
manusyastitvatteyum atine sanvidhanicca ritiyeyum tanneyana satyam
ennitt atinn atinre dustatayum atinre suksmatayum sambandhicc avan beadham nalkukayum ceytirikkunnu
tirccayayum atine (astitvatte) parisud'dhamakkiyavan vijayam kaivariccu
atine kalankappetuttiyavan tirccayayum nirbhagyamatayukayum ceytu
thamud geatram atinre dhikkaram mulam (satyatte) nisedhiccu tallukayuntayi
avarute kuttattile erravum dustatayullavan orunni purappetta sandarbham
appeal allahuvinre dutan avareat parannu. allahuvinre ottakatteyum atinre vellam kutiyum ninnal suksikkuka

appeal avar addehatte nisedhiccu tallukayum atine (ottakatte) arukeala natattukayum ceytu. appeal avarute papam nimittam avarute raksitav avarkk samula nasam varuttukayum (avarkkellam) at samamakkukayum ceytu
atinre anantaraphalam avan bhayappettirunnumilla
ravinetanneyana satyam ; at mutikeantirikkumpeal
pakaline tanneyana satyam ; at pratyaksappetumpeal
anineyum pennineyum srsticca ritiye tanneyana satyam
tirccayayum ninnalute parisramam vibhinna rupattilullatakunnu
ennal etearal danam nalkukayum, suksmata palikkukayum
erravum uttamamayatine satyappetuttukayum ceytuvea
avannu nam erravum eluppamayatilekk sekaryappetutti keatukkunnatan‌
ennal ar pisukku kanikkukayum, svayam paryaptata natikkukayum
erravum uttamamayatine nisedhiccu tallukayum ceytuvea
avannu nam erravum nerukkamullatilekk sekaryamearukkikeatukkunnatan‌
avan nasattil patikkumpeal avanre dhanam avann prayeajanappetunnatalla
tirccayayum margadarsanam nam'mute badhyatayakunnu
tirccayayum namukkullatakunnu paraleakavum ihaleakavum
atinal alikkattikkeantirikkunna agniyepparri nan ninnalkk takkit nalkiyirikkunnu
erravum dustanaya vyaktiyallate atil pravesikkukayilla
nisedhiccu tallukayum, pintirinnu kalayukayum (vyakti
erravum suksmatayulla vyakti atil ninn akarri nirttappetunnatan‌
parisud'dhinetuvanayi tanre dhanam nalkunna (vyakti
pratyupakaram nalkappetentataya yatearu anugrahavum avanre pakkal oralkkumilla
tanre atyunnatanaya raksitavinre priti tetuka ennatallate
valiye avan trptippetunnatan‌
purvvahnam tanneyana satyam
ratri tanneyana satyam; at santamavumpeal
(nabiye,) ninre raksitav ninne kaivittittilla. veruttittumilla
tirccayayum paraleakaman ninakk ihaleakattekkal uttamamayittullat‌
valiye ninakk ninre raksitav (anugrahannal) nalkunnatum appeal ni trptippetunnatumana.‌
ninne avan oru anathayayi kanetattukayum , ennitt (ninakk‌) asrayam nalkukayum ceytille
ninne avan vali ariyattavanayi kanetattukayum ennitt (ninakk‌) margadarsanam nalkukayum ceytirikkunnu
ninne avan daridranayi kanetattukayum ennitt avan aisvaryam nalkukayum ceytirikkunnu
ennirikke anathaye ni aticcamarttarut‌
ceadicc varunnavane ni viratti vitukayum ceyyarut‌
ninre raksitavinre anugrahatte sambandhicc ni sansarikkuka
